entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. High minus 16.
